edu.umd.cs.guitar.replayer.monitor

Class PauseMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.guitar.replayer.monitor.GTestMonitor
      • edu.umd.cs.guitar.replayer.monitor.PauseMonitor

  • public class PauseMonitor
extends GTestMonitor
    Add a pause after each step. This monitor is used to examine individual test case in detail.

    Author:
    Bao N. Nguyen
